definitions.definition: Any of several carrion -eating birds of the families Accipitridae and Cathartidae .
A person who profits from the suffering of others.
examples: Within ten minutes of the accident, the vultures appeared and were organizing lawsuits.

main_definition: Any of several carrion -eating birds of the families Accipitridae and Cathartidae .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative , colloquial ) A person who profits from the suffering of others.
